title: Hanging, "Starlight", 1974
medium: Technique: Woven with warp pick-up technique
inscribed: Two handwritten hanging cardboard tags. 1. "T.GUERMONPREZ, STARLIGHT, JOHN ELSESSER LOAN" 2. "'STARLIGHT' 1974 TRUDE GUERMONPREZ"
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 91.4 x 64.8 cm (36 in. x 25 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Hanging with image of a 8 pointed star in red and white.
